name: Amaru

biography.description: Amaru uses the Garra Hook to quickly ascend ledges, windows, and even open hatches, surprising enemies with her mobility.

gameplayTips: Use the Garra Hook to quickly reposition and surprise enemies.
Coordinate with teammates to capitalize on the chaos caused by your rapid entry.
Be mindful of your surroundings to avoid being caught off guard after using the Garra Hook.
